name: 2024 10th International Conference on Mechatronics System and Robots
content: Publication: After a careful reviewing process, all accepted papers of ICMSR 2024 will be published in ICMSR 2024 Conference Proceedings, and will be submitted for indexing to ISI/CPCI (Web of Science), Scopus, EI Compendex, Inspec (IET), Google Scholar, CAS, DOAJ, ProQuest, Zentrablatt, EBSCO etc.
organizers: Sensors and Systems Society of Singapore
